tutorialSteps.title: Complete combat lessons
tutorialSteps.instructions: Visit a server's training hall, (type the `/town` command, then use the drop down to select the 'Training Hall') and complete the first 6 lessons

tutorialSteps.title: View your character stats
tutorialSteps.instructions: Use the `/profile` command to view your stats and abilities and see if you are ready for combat

tutorialSteps.title: Increase your character's stats
tutorialSteps.instructions: Use the `/stats` command to open the stat allocation menu and begin increasing your character's stats

tutorialSteps.title: Create abilities for your character
tutorialSteps.instructions:
You are almost ready to venture into the wild! Last thing to do is create some abilities for you to use.

Let's starts with an attack
Use the `/abilities create` command to begin creating your first ability.

Note: This ability will be called whatever you type in the `name` section when doing this command

tutorialSteps.title: Finish creating abilities for your character
tutorialSteps.instructions:
You are almost ready to venture into the wild! Last thing to do is create some abilities for you to use.

Use the `/abilities create` command to begin creating your second ability.

Note: This ability will be called whatever you type in the `name` section when doing this command

tutorialSteps.title: Time for a combat test!
tutorialSteps.instructions: Venture into the wild by doing `/explore` and selecting 'Look for an enemy to fight in the wild'

tutorialSteps.title: Spending Gold
tutorialSteps.instructions: You've earned some gold from your first fight! Head to town using the `/town` command and visit the 'Tavern'

tutorialSteps.title: Buying Equipment
tutorialSteps.instructions: Head to town using the `/town` command and visit the 'Market'

tutorialSteps.title: Leveling The Town
tutorialSteps.instructions: Head to town using the `/town` command and visit the 'Meeting Hall'

choice.title: Cluttered Cavern
choice.prompt: You enter a cavern-like hallway with large rock formations blocking the path to the other side

options.name: Break through the obstructing rocks
options.description: Use your strength to break through the rock formations and clear a path

options.name: Swiftly navigate to the exit
options.description: Use your agility to make your way through the rocks towards the end of the hall

choice.title: Rune Door
choice.prompt: You find a door with a magical aura around it that seems to originating from a rune in the center

options.name: Negate the power of the rune
options.description: Use your knowledge of supernatural forces to negate the rune's power

options.name: Break through the door
options.description: Use your strength to attempt to break down the door

choice.title: Foggy Cavern
choice.prompt: You find yourself in a ominously dark room

options.name: Dispel the darkness
options.description: Use your supernatural abilities to eradicate the source of the darkness

options.name: Navigate with caution
options.description: Use your supernatural knowledge to pass through the darkness

choice.title: Piston Door
choice.prompt: A mechanical piston door blocks your path. It's seems to be running on some form of energy, but if the force of the pistons was resisted the entire mechanism may break.

options.name: Resist piston force
options.description: Use your resilience to stop the force of the piston, causing the door to malfunction

options.name: Attack the power source
options.description: Use a supernatural attack to damage the power source of the pistons

choice.title: Steep Climbing Wall
choice.prompt: You come across a steep wall. It will be tough to climb to the top, but a quick burst of speed may allow you to scale it

options.name: Sprint to the top
options.description: Use your agility to scale the wall quickly

options.name: Climb upwards
options.description: Use your resilience to climb to the top of the wall

choice.title: Bomb Trap
choice.prompt: You enter a small room. A section of the ceiling slides open and some kind of pulsating explosive falls down to the floor. You don't have much time to act.

options.name: Launch the explosive away with a physical attack
options.description: Use your strength to knock the explosive away from yourself

options.name: Launch the explosive away with a supernatural attack
options.description: Use a supernatural attack to send the explosive away from yourself

options.name: Run out the room
options.description: Use your agility make it out the room before the object explodes

choice.title: Trigger Panel
choice.prompt: You walk into a dark room. As you take a step inward you feel a pressure plate under your foot go downwards and hear the sound of something approaching you at a high speed

options.name: Prepare for impact
options.description: Use your resilience to hold your ground and prepare for impact with the incoming object

options.name: Shield yourself from impact
options.description: Use a supernatural force to protect yourself from the incoming object

options.name: Evade the object
options.description: Use your agility to get out of the way of the incoming object

choice.title: Pressure Plate Door
choice.prompt: You enter a room where a door can be opened if something is placed on a specific pressure plate. There are some large boulders in the room.

options.name: Move boulders onto the pressure plate
options.description: Use your strength to move the boulders onto the pressure plate

options.name: Rush through the door
options.description: Use your agility to trigger the pressure plate yourself and then run through the door while its open

choice.title: Water Cannon
choice.prompt: You walk into a room where large volumes of water are frequently, but not constantly, launched across the room.

options.name: Evade the water blasts
options.description: Use your agility to sprint through the room

options.name: March towards the exit
options.description: Use your resilience to march towards the room exist without being knocked over by the water

choice.title: Electrified Floor
choice.prompt: You enter a room where the entire floor seems to be electrified. In the center of the room lays a magical artifact that seems to be providing the electricity

options.name: Resist the electricity
options.description: Use your resilience to resist the electrical currents as you make your way out the room

options.name: Disable the rune
options.description: Use a supernatural force to disable the rune

choice.title: Floating Platforms
choice.prompt: You enter a large room where a rapidly rotating rune floats in the center. You attempt to make your way towards and exit, but the rune begins to gather energy, as if preparing to fire off an attack

options.name: Disable the rune
options.description: Use a supernatural attack to disable the rune

options.name: Protect yourself
options.description: Use your knowledge of supernatural forces to shield yourself from the rune's attacks

choice.title: Rune Sealed Wall
choice.prompt: You come across a makeshift barrier that seems to be toughened by some sort of hardening magic

options.name: Smash through the barrier
options.description: Use your strength to preform a heavy hitting attack and break the wall

options.name: Negate magical barrier
options.description: Use your knowledge of supernatural forces to disable the magic

choice.title: Falling Boulders
choice.prompt: You enter a room and step on a pressure plate. You hear rumbling sound from above you and see large boulders plummeting towards you. You won't have time to avoid them

options.name: Break the boulders as they fall
options.description: Use your strength to smash the boulders into pieces

options.name: Brace for impact
options.description: Use your resilience to prepare your self for the impact with the boulders

choice.title: Flamethrower Room
choice.prompt: You enter a room where columns of magical flames are being spewed out holes in the walls in a sequential order. You will need to get through them to progress.

options.name: Navigate swiftly through the flames
options.description: Use your agility to make a run for it through the flames

options.name: Resist the flames
options.description: Use a supernatural force to protect yourself from the magical flames as you make your way through

choice.title: Rotating Panel Door
choice.prompt: You come across a large door made up of panels that seem to be rotating due to a magical force

options.name: Smash the panels
options.description: Use your strength to smash your way through the panels

options.name: Disable the panels
options.description: Use a supernatural attack to disable the panels and pass through

choice.title: Bat Cavern
choice.prompt: You enter a room of darkness and step into a small puddle. The sound of your step echoes through the cavern as you begin to hear the screeches of bats flying towards you

options.name: Protect yourself
options.description: Use your resilience to protect yourself from the flurry of bats coming your way

options.name: Repel the bats
options.description: Use a supernatural attack keep the bats from attacking you

choice.title: Magical Totems
choice.prompt: You come across a room where multiple large totems are positioned in the center. Upon entering the room the totems light up and begin hurling magical energy at you.

options.name: Evade and escape
options.description: Use your agility to evade the incoming magical attacks and escape

options.name: Counter attack
options.description: Use supernatural attacks to counter the magic energy being shot at you

choice.title: Pellet Launchers
choice.prompt: You come across a room where small pellets are being launched at high speed all over the room. There are too many of them for you to dodge them all.

options.name: Retaliate and move
options.description: Use your strength to break the pellets as they fly towards you

options.name: Resist the pellets
options.description: Use your resilience to resist the pellets as you make your way through

choice.title: Fireball Rune
choice.prompt: You enter a clearing where large fireballs are orbiting a rune in the center

options.name: Attack the rune
options.description: Use a supernatural attack to break the rune

options.name: Disable the rune
options.description: Use your knowledge of supernatural forces to disable the rune

options.name: Resist the fire
options.description: Use your resilience to resist the fire as you make your way through the room

choice.title: Spike shooter
choice.prompt: You find a clearing where a magical contraption is spewing out spike balls at a rapid rate.

options.name: Deflect the spike balls
options.description: Use your resilience to deflect any spike balls that come your way

options.name: Attack the machine
options.description: Use your strength to destroy the machine

options.name: Disable the machine
options.description: Use your knowledge of supernatural forces to disable the machine

choice.title: Cursed Totem
choice.prompt: You enter a room and immediately begin to feel weak as if something is draining the life out of you. You catch a glimpse of a totem in the center that seems to be the source of the weakening aura

options.name: Attack the totem
options.description: Use your strength to destroy the totem

options.name: Attack the machine
options.description: Use a supernatural attack to destroy the totem

options.name: Protect yourself
options.description: Use your knowledge of supernatural forces protect yourself from the totem's effect

choice.title: Spike Net
choice.prompt: You step on a pressure plate and a section of the wall slides away. Soon after a spiked net is shot towards you from the opening.

options.name: Break the net
options.description: Use your strength to break through the net before it traps you.

options.name: Resist the net
options.description: Use your resilience to endure the net's spikes and remove it afterwards

options.name: Avoid the net
options.description: Use your agility to prevent the net from hitting you

choice.title: Laser Runes
choice.prompt: You enter a room where beams of energy are being shot between the walls by levitating runes.

options.name: Attack the runes
options.description: Use a supernatural attack to destroy the laser emitting runes.

options.name: Disable the runes
options.description: Use your knowledge of supernatural forces to disable the rune's magic

options.name: Navigate through the room
options.description: Use your agility to avoid the lasers as you make your way through the room

Swamp: Traveling through the swamp you stumble upon an abandoned cargo crate. Someone must've have dropped it while fleeing from a threat. No sense letting it's contents go to waste.
You discover the opening to a cave and venture inside. Inside, you find an abandoned campfire and some supplies.
The sploshing of mud under you is suddenly interrupted as you here a jingle of coins. You look down to discover a small bag of coins lodged deep in the mud.
You find a statue in the middle of a clearing with a small pool of water around it. You spot a few gold coins in the fountain so you decide to snag them for yourself as you continue along your way.
You've been taking it easy as you stroll through the jungle, but you suddenly get and uneasy feeling that you are being followed. You decide to pick up the pace of your adventure.
You come across a steep hill in the direction you were already heading in. Rather than finding an easier path you make your way up it , pausing to take in the view and catch your breath at the top.

Suddenly, you stumble on an unseen object and plummet face first into the mud. As you lift yourself back up you realize that you tripped over some kind of container buried in mud. Wonder what's inside?.
You come across a small stone structure in a clearing. It's pyramid shaped and in the center lies a podium with something in the center.

You notice a glowing light from within a cave. You enter the cave to find a floating bundle of energy, its glow reflecting on the cave walls. You approach it and feel a burst of energy course through your body as it dissolves around you.
Tundra: You find some tracks in the snow of some sort of wagon. You follow them till you come across the wagon itself, abandoned and crashed into a tree with a barrel of supplies left behind.
You notice a smoke signal in the distance so you make your way towards it. Upon reaching the source you find a seemingly abandoned campsite with some supplies left behind.
You take shelter in the opening of a cave and see that a part of the cave wall has caved in. Digging deeper you are able to uncover some rare gems that can be sold for gold.
Treading through the tundra landscape you notice something slightly buried under a thin layer of snow. You uncover it to find a dazzling gemstone. Might be able to sell this for gold.

The blizzard winds begin to pick up and you hurry to find any kind of shelter to bear the storm. You eventually find a cave and are able to protect yourself from the elements. Exhausted from your efforts, you decide to rest.
The sound of rumbling can be heard in the distance. You look behind you to see an avalanche tumbling down a mountain side in your direction. You make a run for it and are able to get out of it's way.

Treading through the tundra landscape you notice something slightly buried under a thin layer of snow. You uncover it to find a knapsack with some equipment inside. Whoever lost this must not need it now, else it wouldn't be here.

You see a small wooden shack in a clearing. You make your way to it and find that there is a table with some equipment left on top of it. No one seems to have been here recently so you decide to take it for yourself.

You notice a glowing light in a frozen lake, close to the surface. Carefully, you make your way to the light source in the lake and watch as it bursts up from the ice and floats towards you. You approach it and feel a burst of energy course through your body as it dissolves around you.
Desert: Walking through the vast desert you come across an odd lump of sand. You dig into and uncover and abandoned stash of resources.
A sandstorm forces you to take shelter in a cave where you come across a cache of abandoned resources.
A partially buried object in the sand catches your eye, you approach it to find that it is an ancient artifact. Might be able to sell this for gold.
You come across a strange metal vessel, abandoned in the desert. Aboard it you don't find much other than some gold that has seemingly been left behind.

Before your eyes, a ferocious dust devil begins to form in front of you. You hurry to escape it's fury as it tosses sand into the air, blinding your vision. Luckily, you are eventually able to flee its wrath.
You reach the top of a sand dune to find a hidden oasis below you. You make your way to it and take a moment to rest amongst a natural water spring.
As you journey through the desert you come across a jumbled assortment of armor pieces and weapons. Luckily, you are able to find something that is still intact.
In the distance you are able to spot a lone campsite. You approach it to find an abandoned fire pit that's still warm.

As you rest near a fire during the night you hear a voice call out behind you. You turn around to find a glowing ball of light floating above the sand. It begins to get closer to you before dissipating around you.
Islands: Walking along side the beach you notice a barrel that has washed upon the shore. You open it to find some resources.
You come across a bundle of leaves that seem to be helping something blend into the surrounding environment.
The low tide reveals a chest that is partially covered in sand. You dig it out and find some gold coins left behind.
You decide to explore a cave alongside the coast and find a beautiful scale hidden within it's depths.
While walking along the coast, you notice that a storm is approaching. You quickly make your way inland and prep a makeshift shelter to wait out the storm.
The sun begins to set after a long day of exploring. You take a moment to watch it from the shore as you listen to the sounds of the ocean's breeze.
You come across a shipwreck around some jagged rocks on the coast. You board what's left of the ship and find a locked chest that seems to have been forgotten.
Within the treeline you spot a tree house. You climb up to it to discover that it is mostly abandoned with a few things left behind.

As another wave crashes into the coast, peculiar looking object is revealed as the waves pull away from the shore. As you approach it, it shudders a bit before releasing a burst of light that dissipates quickly.
Mountains: Walking along the mountain path you find a small campsite that seems to have been abandoned. A few resources have been left behind.
Reaching the summit of a small peak, you take in the sights for a moment before spotting a makeshift shelter below you. You go to investigate it and find some resources.

You decide to make your way through a cave in the cliff side and stumble upon some peculiar gems that shine through the caves darkness. You decide to pocket a few that have broke loose from the cave wall.
You find the entrance to a mineshaft in the cliff side. An old mine cart is still on the tracks and you find some gold pieces left behind in it.

While trekking up the mountain side, strong winds begin to blow. You loose your balance and are sent tumble off a cliff, but manage to latch on to a rock jutting out from the side and climb your way back up.
As you reach the high point on the trail, you are able to get tremendous view of your surroundings. You rest for a moment and take in the sight of the land stretching out towards the horizon.
Along the slide of a steep cliff you find some abandoned hiking gear. You decide to inspect it further to see if there is anything you might be able to utilize.
You come across a small body of water at the bottom of another steep incline. The water is shallow so you can see that there is something strange at the bottom of it.

You walk beside a strange engraving in the cliff side that calls to you for some reason. It suddenly begins to glow and a flash of light quickly bursts outwards from it, enveloping you in an familiar energy.
Forest: You come across a tree with a hallowed out opening covered in leaves. You remove the leaves and find some resources.
You come across a clearing where it seems multiple trees have sustained large amounts of damage from some kind of beast. You also find some resources scattered about.
You come across a river and spot something shiny near the surface, caught between a few rocks. You wiggle it out and inspect it to find that it is some type of jewelry, must be worth something.
You find abandoned shelter that is covered in vegetation. Must've been here a while. Inside there seem to be some valuables left intact.
The trees of the forest seem to go on forever in all directions around you. You decide to climb to the roof of the forest to get better view of your surroundings and plan your next destination.
You decide to follow a small creek that cuts through the forest. It grows wider as it leads to a huge waterfall. You take a moment to enjoy the sights and listen to the falls.
You find a fire pit with a few logs and leaf piles close by. The fire pit seems to have not been used in a while. You decide to inspect the leaf piles for any supplies.
Hidden amongst the trees you come across the opening to a shallow cave. You enter and find some leftover equipment.

As you walk through a clearing in the forest you hear a voice above you. You look up to see a bright bundle of light floating in the air. It descends to your eye level and slowly dissipates as it surrounds you.

challengeDict.name: No pain, no gain
challengeDict.description: Receive X damage from enemies in combat

challengeDict.name: Talk to the hand
challengeDict.description: Block X base damage in combat

challengeDict.name: Applying pressure
challengeDict.description: Deal X damage with attacks in combat

challengeDict.name: Early bird
challengeDict.description: Be the first to attack during a turn X times

challengeDict.name: Bullseye
challengeDict.description: Land a critical hit X times

challengeDict.name: Now it's my turn
challengeDict.description: Deal X damage with counter attacks in combat

challengeDict.name: We don't do that here
challengeDict.description: Entirely block an enemy's attack X times

challengeDict.name: Raising the bar
challengeDict.description: Increase an ally or your own stat in combat X times

challengeDict.name: Sabotaged
challengeDict.description: Lower an enemy's stat in combat X times

challengeDict.name: Do over!
challengeDict.description: Successfully use an ability twice in a row in combat X times

challengeDict.name: This is the ultimate!
challengeDict.description: Empower an ability with X times

challengeDict.name: Cha cha real smooth
challengeDict.description: Change your combat stance X times

challengeDict.name: One tapped
challengeDict.description: Deal X or more damage with a single attack

challengeDict.name: I did my research!
challengeDict.description: Land X highly effective attacks on enemy stances

challengeDict.name: Expecting something?
challengeDict.description: Resist X attacks with your stance

passiveDescriptions.name: Abnormal Regeneration
passiveDescriptions.description: For each time you have been damaged gain X health at the end of a turn

passiveDescriptions.name: Volatile Radiance
passiveDescriptions.description: When damaged by a special attack, the attacker loses X% of their maximum health. This damage is non-lethal

passiveDescriptions.name: Harsh Exterior
passiveDescriptions.description: When damaged by a physical attack, the attacker loses X% of their maximum health. This damage is non-lethal

passiveDescriptions.name: Unstable Composition
passiveDescriptions.description: Upon losing a life, all other combatants lose X% of the users maximum health. This damage is non-lethal

passiveDescriptions.name: Sensitive Backlash
passiveDescriptions.description: Upon taking damage from a critical hit, the attacker loses X% of their maximum health. This damage is non-lethal

passiveDescriptions.name: Raging Demon
passiveDescriptions.description: For each time you have been damaged, your attacks have their base power increased by X

passiveDescriptions.name: Inevitable Decimator
passiveDescriptions.description: If an attack is the last action of the round, it's base power is multiplied by X

passiveDescriptions.name: Reckless Opportunist
passiveDescriptions.description: For every 10% of recoil damage taken, attacks have X% more critical chance

passiveDescriptions.name: Giant Slayer
passiveDescriptions.description: Deal X% more damage for every 5% more maximum health a target has

passiveDescriptions.name: Rage Point
passiveDescriptions.description: Once under X% of maximum health, ignore target's block ability

weapon: Critical hits ignore X% of targets defense stat
Battering Blows
An attack used on a target before they have done an action increases base damage by X
Sucker Strike
X% chance to increase a random stat by one stage when hitting an unguarded target
Combat Confidence
X% chance to lower the offensive stats of enemies on the first turn
Daunting Display
Repeating an attack on the same target increases the attack’s critical chance by X%
Precise Pursuit
If the target’s active defensive stat is their largest defensive stat, deal X% more total damage
Titan Toppler
Abilities gain X% critical chance for every 10% more speed the user has than a target (Up to 100%)
Rapid Razor
When attacked before using an non-guard ability, have a X% chance to parry. Parrying blocks an attack, but lowers your speed by 1 stage when activated
Wise Warrior
Attacks that aren't guarded against have a X% chance to lower the target’s speed
Crippling Combatant
When a target's stats are lowered by an ability there is a X% chance they take damage based on the change in the stat (Capped at 5% of their maximum health, cannot be lethal)
Insulting Imposer
gear: Counter attacks have a X% chance to critically hit
Counter Calculator
If an attack is completely blocked, X% chance to lower the attacker's def or spdef by 2 stages
Fracturing Foundation
After successfully using a guard, your next guard has +X% chance of succeeding
Greedy Guard
X% chance to lower the defensive stats of enemies on the first turn
Supreme Stature
Guards gain X% more effectiveness when blocking non-matching attacks
Formidable Flexibility
X% chance to increase a random stat by one stage when completely blocking an attack
Motivating Marcher
When attacking a guarding enemy, their guard loses up to X% of its base guard value based on the difference between the defender and the attacker’s max hp
Crushing Crusader
When attacked while not guarding, the attacker’s offensive stat has a X% chance to be lowered by 1 stage
Adapting Adversary
%X chance to critically guard, doubling guard value of a block
Dire Defender
%X chance to gain 5% of max hp when ever stats are lowered by an ability
Rapid Reconciler

tavernOptions.label: Assassin's Asparagus
tavernOptions.description: 1 Stage Speed booster for 1 hour - 250 gold

tavernOptions.label: Berserker's Beef
tavernOptions.description: 1 Stage Attack booster for 1 hour - 250 gold

tavernOptions.label: Caster's Cornbread
tavernOptions.description: 1 Stage Special Attack booster for 1 hour - 250 gold

tavernOptions.label: Defender's Dumplings
tavernOptions.description: 1 Stage Defense booster for 1 hour - 250 gold

tavernOptions.label: Enforcer's Empanadas
tavernOptions.description: 1 Stage Special Defense booster for 1 hour - 250 gold

hp.name: Quick Thinking
hp.description: Switching to this stance applies a shield that absorbs damage equal to X% of your max health for the remainder of the turn

hp.name: Tension
hp.description: While in this stance, reduce damage taken from attack abilities by up to X%, scaling with how much of maximum health you are missing

hp.name: Confidence
hp.description: While in this stance, increase the guard value of abilities used by up to X%, scaling with how much of your maximum health you have remaining

atk.name: Fierce Figure
atk.description: Switching to this stance has a X% chance to set all enemy def multipliers to 0.8x

atk.name: Rage
atk.description: While in this stance, while using an attack ability, your atk stat is increased by X% for each time you have taken damage from an ability while in this stance

atk.name: Recklessness
atk.description: While in this stance, abilities have their chance to critical hit increased by X% (chance max increased to 100%), but successful critical hits deal 10% recoil damage. If an ability's crit chance would go over 100%, recoil damage is only 5%

def.name: Bold Move
def.description: Switching to this stance sets your def multiplier to Xx, but sets your atk and spatk multipliers to 0.8x

def.name: Stamina
def.description: While in this stance, taking damage from an atk based ability has a X% chance to increase your def multiplier by 1 stage

def.name: Fortuity
def.description: While in this stance, incoming spatk based abilities have a X% chance to miss

spatk.name: Clear Mind
spatk.description: Switching to this stance increases the base damage of abilities you use during this fight by X. This stacks infinitely

spatk.name: Focus
spatk.description: While in this stance, your spatk stat is increased by X% for each non-damaging ability you use, resets when dealing damage with an ability

spatk.name: Finesse
spatk.description: While in this stance, reduce recoil damage taken from abilities by X%, but all abilities have their critical chance reduced by 10%

spdef.name: Stoic Form
spdef.description: Switching to this stance has a X% chance to set all enemy atk and spatk multipliers to 0.9x

spdef.name: Supremacy
spdef.description: While in this stance, reduce damage taken from abilities by X% for every active enemy in combat

spdef.name: Dominance
spdef.description: While in this stance, defeating an enemy with an attack restores your health by X% of your maximum health

spd.name: Full Throttle
spd.description: Switching to this stance consumes X% of you combo meter to set your spd multiplier equal to your meter rank x1.5. If your meter rank is 0, your spd multiplier is set to x1

spd.name: Haste
spd.description: While in this stance, damaging abilities additionally use X% of your spd stat when calculating damage

spd.name: Flow
spd.description: While in this stance, there is a X% chance that your combo meter gain is doubled

townTasks.name: Cattle Round Up
townTasks.description: The cattle of the town have gotten loose! They've spread themselves all around the town.
townTasks.taskPrompt: Determine the best way to get the cattle back into their pens.
townTasks.suggestedSolutionPrompt: The cattle are numerous and very spread out. It might be easier to stop the cattle with something other than your physical body.

hp.solutionDesc: Collect the cattle by lifting them and return them to their pens.

atk.solutionDesc: Scare the cattle back to their pens by using intimidating attacks.

def.solutionDesc: Resist their attempts to flee until they tire and can be easily led back to their pens.

spatk.solutionDesc: Use powerful magic to scare the cattle back into their pens.

spdef.solutionDesc: Use magic to set up blockades so that the cattle have no where to run.

spd.solutionDesc: Use your agility to catch each one individually and return them to their pen.

townTasks.name: Building Repair
townTasks.description: A member of the town would like some assistance in rebuilding their home after the last storm.
townTasks.taskPrompt: Determine the best way to help them reconstruct their home
townTasks.suggestedSolutionPrompt: Physical strength would be helpful in taking care of the many tasks need for construction

hp.solutionDesc: Use your perseverance to work nonstop on rebuilding the house.

atk.solutionDesc: Use your strength to rebuild the house efficiently.

def.solutionDesc: Rely on your constitution to hold things in place while others work on the house's structure.

spatk.solutionDesc: Use supernatural forces to manipulate the pieces of the house back into place.

spdef.solutionDesc: Use supernatural forces to protect and stabilize the house while others work on the house's structure.

spd.solutionDesc: Use your dexterity to be everywhere at once, working on the house as quickly as possible.

townTasks.name: Dangerous Storm
townTasks.description: A terrible storm has rolled into town unexpectedly
townTasks.taskPrompt: The townsfolk need to be protected!
townTasks.suggestedSolutionPrompt: The storm seems to be supernatural in nature, think of ways you can protect and shelter others without using magic.

hp.solutionDesc: Round up groups of people and carry them inside

atk.solutionDesc: Push people out of harms way of the storm

def.solutionDesc: Provide cover for people caught out in the open

spatk.solutionDesc: Use supernatural abilities to fight the storm

spdef.solutionDesc: Use supernatural abilities to protect the towns people from the storm

spd.solutionDesc: Use your speed to run through town, urging people to take cover and leading them to shelter

innateFacilities.description: Facility to learn mechanics or new abilities
innateFacilities.name: Training Hall

innateFacilities.description: Facility to assign jobs and view town upgrade progress
innateFacilities.name: Meeting Hall

innateFacilities.description: Facility to upgrade existing abilities or equipement
innateFacilities.name: Armory Hall

innateFacilities.description: Facility to fight against raiding forces
innateFacilities.name: Militia Hall

innateFacilities.description: Facility to embark on dungeon raids and expeditions
innateFacilities.name: Adventurer's Hall

innateFacilities.description: Facility to complete tasks given by townsfolk
innateFacilities.name: Task Hall

innateFacilities.description: Facility to purchase lives and boosts
innateFacilities.name: Tavern

innateFacilities.description: Facility to buy gear and weapons
innateFacilities.name: Market

training.title: Training Hall
training.info:
In this facility you can learn the basics of combat encounters by completing the various training lessons. Additionally you can also spend gold to learn new combat abilities that reset daily. These abilities are unique to this town and become better as a town’s level increases.

To learn more about town level, it’s recommended you visit the Meeting Hall.

jobs.title: Meeting Hall
jobs.info:
In this facility you can view the town’s progression towards the next level. You can also assign yourself a different job to help the town gain resources needed to level up. Once the point threshold is reached, resources are maxed, and the respective dungeon level is cleared, the town will level up.

While a town’s resources are maxed it will generate town points over time in exchange for a small portion of resources. Additionally, failing to defend your town from the daily raid will result in a loss of town points. To learn about raids, it’s recommended you visit the Militia Hall

defense.title: Militia Hall
defense.info:
In this facility you can learn about the current raiding forces that are attacking the town. To stop the forces you must defeat their leader and in order to challenge them the Simple, Normal, and Challenging Missions must be completed. You don’t have to do these missions alone, anyone in this discord server can help towards completing these missions so that the raid leader becomes available to challenge.

Once a raid leader is defeated, expeditions and dungeon runs from the town will become more rewarding. To learn more about expeditions and dungeons, it’s recommended you visit the Adventurer’s Hall.

adventure.title: Adventure Hall
adventure.info:
In this facility you may embark on dungeon runs.

During a dungeon run you will face combat challenges alongside situations that will test your character’s stats. After completing a run, you will earn rewards based on your performance. To learn a simple way to increase your stats, it’s recommended you visit the Task Hall.

tasks.title: Task Hall
tasks.info:
In this facility you can complete tasks for the people of the town. Each task has a solution that corresponds to a particular stat. Not every solution is as effective depending on the task so choose wisely.

After completing a task you will be rewarded with gold, experience and occasionally your stats will increase. To learn about ways to spend gold, it’s recommended you visit the Tavern.

tavern.title: Tavern
tavern.info: In this facility you can spend gold on meals that increase your stats for a set period of time. Additionally you can purchase more lives to give you extra chances in combat. To learn about ways to increase your stats for longer periods of time, it’s recommended you visit the Market.

market.title: Market
market.info:
In this facility you can spend gold to purchase weapons and gear that can increase your stats and provide passive benefits. Similarly to the training hall, the equipment purchased here is unique to this town and improves as the town level increases.

Once a piece of equipment has been purchased, you can equip it by viewing it in your inventory using the /inventory command.

acquiredFacilities.description: Facility to compete in 'King of the Hill' mini-game
acquiredFacilities.name: Battle Hall

quests.name: Take my hand

converter.0: You grab your melee weapon and as
converter.1: You grab your projectile based weapon and as
converter.2: You grab your spell-casting accessory and as
converter.3: You place your hand on a rune, enhancing your innate elemental powers. As

converter.0: You feel your heart beating in your little chest as you wait nervously
converter.1: You feel sweat begin to form so you wipe it with your arm
converter.2: Your widened eyes are fixed on the treeline, ready to pounce
converter.3: You feel an otherworldly presence so you steady yourself

script:
You rest under the stars next to a still waterfront waiting for your mind to ease. Hopefully soon you will fa-

FRWOOSHHSHHSHHSHRRR

You hear a loud sound coming from the woods behind you.

Something is coming your way. You run over to your knapsack to grab your equipment so you can defend yourself.
FILLER-0 you rise to confront whatever is approaching you catch a glimpse of yourself in the water.

You turn from the water and face the woods.FILLER-0. Before you can react, an unrecognizeable figure appears directly infront of you and attacks. The force of his attack knocks you to the ground

`It seems you won't do` a voice says as the figure looms over you, lifting what seems to be a weapon high above itself

`Till next time`

The weapons swings downward

You jolt awake

You've had the dream that everyone has told you about. Your time has come for you to change your reality
